alert.note: Alert for Eastern Orleans; Lower Jefferson; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard; Southeast St. Tammany; Upper Jefferson; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 30 at 12:20PM CDT until March 31 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 AM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, south winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast and southern Mississippi and southeast Louisiana. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 9 PM CDT this evening. For the Wind Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to 1 AM CDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
